front.title: Traffic Engineering Extensions to OSPF for Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) Control of Evolutive G.709 OTN Networks

abstract.t: This document describes OSPF routing protocol extensions to support the evolutive Optical Transport Networks (OTN) under the control of Generalized MPLS (GMPLS). zhang Expires April 2010 [page 1] draft-ceccarelli-ccamp-gmpls-ospf-g709-00.txt October 2009
